title: Literatuur magazine nr. 21 Engelse editie Agatha Christie
description: Contains The Muder of Roger Ackroyd (1926) and six stories from the bundle The Mousetrap (Strange Jest, The Case of the Perfect Maid, The Third-Floor Flat, The Adventure of Johnnie Waverly, Four and Twenty Blackbirds, The Love Detectives)
author: Agatha Christie
